item.title: Desert Island Discs
item.description: I absolutely love listening to the popular radio program “Desert Island Discs”. The concept is simple: if you were on a desert island, which 8 pieces of music (that can fit on a single “disc”) would you take? My current selection, in no particular order, are the following: Sibelius - Symphony 7. For me the most “perfect” orchestral work ever composed. Still waiting to hear this one live. Could this moment be the best cadence in music?
